description: This gets the invoice profile associated with a set of accounts. The accounts must be linked accounts under the requester management account organization.

nested_items.name: Profiles
nested_items.description: A list of invoice profiles corresponding to the requested accounts.

nested_items.name: AccountId
nested_items.description: The account ID the invoice profile is generated for.

nested_items.name: ReceiverName
nested_items.description: The name of the person receiving the invoice profile.

nested_items.name: ReceiverAddress
nested_items.description: The address of the receiver that will be printed on the invoice.

nested_items.name: AddressLine1
nested_items.description: The first line of the address.

nested_items.name: AddressLine2
nested_items.description: The second line of the address, if applicable.

nested_items.name: AddressLine3
nested_items.description: The third line of the address, if applicable.

nested_items.name: DistrictOrCounty
nested_items.description: The district or country the address is located in.

nested_items.name: City
nested_items.description: The city that the address is in.

nested_items.name: StateOrRegion
nested_items.description: The state, region, or province the address is located.

nested_items.name: CountryCode
nested_items.description: The country code for the country the address is in.

nested_items.name: PostalCode
nested_items.description: The postal code associated with the address.

nested_items.name: ReceiverEmail
nested_items.description: The email address for the invoice profile receiver.

nested_items.name: Issuer
nested_items.description: This specifies the issuing entity of the invoice.
